biotools.summary: CRISPRStudio is a program developed to facilitate and accelerate CRISPR array visualization. It works by first comparing spacers sequence homology in a dataset, then assigning a two-color-code to each cluster of spacers and finally writing an svg file, which can be opened in graphics vector editor.

galaxy.summary: CRISPR Studio is a program developed to facilitate and accelerate CRISPR array visualization.
